title: Full-Stack Portfolio & CI/CD Pipeline
summary: A full-stack portfolio website featuring a complete CI/CD pipeline for automated builds and deployments to a cloud server.
description:
Project Overview

This portfolio is a full-stack application built from the ground up to serve as a dynamic showcase of my work. More than just a frontend, it features a complete DevOps pipeline that automates the entire process from a `git push` to a live deployment on a cloud server, demonstrating a holistic approach to modern web development.

Full-Stack Architecture

  • The frontend is a responsive single-page application built with React and Vite, using the Mantine component library for a clean and modern UI.
  • The backend is a lightweight Node.js and Express server that serves the static React files and provides a REST API for dynamic content like project data and skills.

CI/CD & DevOps Pipeline

  • The entire application is containerized using a multi-stage Dockerfile, which builds the frontend and bundles it with the backend into a single, optimized image.
  • A GitHub Actions workflow automatically triggers on every push to the `main` branch.
  • The workflow builds the Docker image, pushes it to Docker Hub, and then securely connects to an AWS Lightsail instance via SSH.
  • On the server, Docker Compose pulls the new image and seamlessly redeploys the container, ensuring zero downtime.

title: AI Content Generator
summary: A web application that leverages Google's Gemini Pro to help users generate high-quality website content.
description:
Project Overview

An AI-powered content assistant designed to help bloggers, marketers, and website owners overcome writer's block and efficiently produce high-quality, relevant content.

Core Technology

The application leverages the power of Google's Gemini Pro API to generate text that is coherent, context-aware, and tailored to the user's needs.

Key Features

  • A clean and interactive user interface built with Streamlit.
  • Generates a variety of content types, including full-length blog posts and 'About Us' pages.
  • Allows users to define a specific context or 'brand voice' to ensure all generated content is perfectly aligned.

title: WEDO IOS/Android App
summary: A full-stack, cross-platform mobile application designed to connect people through local events and activities.
description:
Project Overview

A full-stack, cross-platform social connection app built for iOS and Android as part of a university capstone project. 'WeDo' helps users build meaningful connections by creating, discovering, and joining local events and activities.

Key Features

  • Personalised event recommendations tailored to user interests.
  • Advanced event search with robust filtering options.
  • An integrated personal calendar to easily track upcoming activities.
  • Functionality for users to create and manage their own events.

Technical Architecture

  • A cross-platform front-end built with React Native for a consistent iOS and Android experience.
  • A scalable back-end powered by Node.js and Express.js.
  • A fully serverless architecture leveraging a suite of AWS services including Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB.

title: The Phone Mason
summary: A business website for a phone and computer repair shop, focusing on local SEO and lead generation.
description:
Project Overview

A comprehensive business website for The Phone Mason, a device repair specialist, designed to capture local market share through strategic SEO.

Key Objectives

  • To generate a consistent stream of qualified local customer leads.
  • To establish a strong, professional online presence in the Howick, Auckland area.
  • To rank highly in local search results for key device repair services.

My Contribution

  • Led the end-to-end development and deployment of the WordPress website.
  • Implemented a robust local SEO strategy, including Google Business Profile optimisation.
  • Performed extensive on-page optimisation focused on relevant keywords and user experience.

Outcomes

  • Achieved a significant boost in organic search visibility within the local market.
  • The website successfully converts targeted traffic into valuable customer leads, creating a reliable growth engine for the business.

title: Kiwi Kandy
summary: An e-commerce store built to sell classic New Zealand confectionery to Kiwis living and working overseas.
description:
Project Overview

A full-scale e-commerce website built for KiwiKandy, dedicated to selling iconic New Zealand confectionery to customers living overseas.

Key Objectives

  • Provide a seamless and enjoyable shopping experience for homesick Kiwis abroad.
  • Establish a secure and reliable platform for handling international payments and shipping.
  • Showcase a wide range of products in a well-organised, user-friendly catalogue.

Features & Implementation

  • Built on a robust WordPress foundation using the powerful WooCommerce plugin to manage all online sales.
  • Configured complex international shipping zones and rates to handle global deliveries.
  • Integrated secure payment gateways, including Stripe, for safe and reliable transactions.
  • Designed a user-friendly product catalogue that is easy to browse and navigate.

title: React Stopwatch
summary: A clean and functional stopwatch application built with React, featuring start, stop, and reset capabilities.
description:
Project Overview

A straightforward stopwatch application built to demonstrate a solid understanding of core React concepts, particularly state management with hooks like useState and useEffect.

Key Feature

The entire logic for starting, stopping, and resetting the timer is handled cleanly within a single, reusable component, highlighting a component-based approach to building interactive UIs.

title: React To-Do
summary: A classic to-do list application built to demonstrate fundamental React concepts like state management and event handling.
description:
Project Overview

A classic to-do list application built as a practical exercise to demonstrate fundamental React skills in state management and component architecture.

Core Functionality

  • Add new tasks to the list.
  • Mark tasks as complete with a visual indicator.
  • Remove tasks from the list.

Technical Implementation

The application's state is managed efficiently with the useState hook. The UI is structured with reusable components for the input form and individual task items.
